1.title: Cold Call
1.plot: While Eric is busy trying to complete his university assignment an annoying cold caller relentlessly pesters him to participate in a survey.

2.title: New Flatmate
2.plot: Eric is showing the spare room of his house to Sarah, a girl attending the same uni who knows how to get what she wants. Eric who is love struck, sacrifices money and cleanliness to get her in but little does he know she has a small secret.

3.title: Lost in Translation
3.plot: Sarah has broken up with her boyfriend so Eric capitalizes on the opportunity to take her to dinner. However - he doesn't get along with the restaurant waitress very well.

4.title: The Library
4.plot: Eric seeks the guidance of books to aid him in attracting Sarah. But he can't find the book in the library and the librarian is less than helpful.

5.title: Tenancy Issues
5.plot: When Eric prepared for the house inspection he did not prepare to be evicted. Disputing an unfair rule in the tenancy agreement is hard work when the real estate agent is set on getting you out.

imdb.plot outline: Big Little City is a comedy web series about an introverted OCD uni student called Eric who is struggling to survive in the big city of Auckland, New Zealand. Eric awkwardly attempts to attract the love of his new hot flatmate Sarah. Unfortunately he is unsuccessful in his attempts and due to a series of rejections is evicted from his house and fired from his job.
imdb.title: Big Little City
plot: Eric, an introverted OCD uni student, is struggling to survive in the big city of Auckland, New Zealand. Confronted with numerous wacky situations and crazy characters, Eric's secure life quickly unravels.::Floyd Moratti

_Big Little City_ (qv) is a comedy web series about an introverted OCD uni student called Eric who is struggling to survive in the big city of Auckland, New Zealand. Eric awkwardly attempts to attract the love of his new hot flatmate Sarah. Unfortunately he is unsuccessful in his attempts and due to a series of rejections is evicted from his house and fired from his job.::Floyd Moratti
